# default

**Type Property**

The default font design.

## Declaration

```swift
static let `default`: NSFontDescriptor.SystemDesign
```

## Designs

- **monospaced**: A font with a monospace appearance.
- **rounded**: A font with a rounded appearance.
- **serif**: A font with a serif design.

items.description: A font with a monospace appearance.
items.name: monospaced

items.description: A font with a rounded appearance.

items.description: A font with a serif design.
